data.comment: The match is underway at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
The home team has substituted Arjan Swinkels with Lukas Schmitz. Hans De Koning is thus making his first change.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Venlo.
Bjorn Kuipers has blown to start the second-half.
Hans De Koning (Venlo) has taken off Giorgos Giakoumakis who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Joshua John is the replacement.
In the minute 58, Luis Sinisterra is replacing Bryan Linssen for Feyenoord at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
Jens Toornstra is on target to give Feyenoord a 0-1 advantage.
Joao Carlos Teixeira instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 73, Goal! Steven Berghuis extends Feyenoord's lead to 0-2.
Joao Carlos Teixeira with an assist there.
Leroy Fer is replacing Joao Carlos Teixeira for the away team.
In the minute 77, Goal! Feyenoord extend their lead to 0-3 through Jens Toornstra.
The home team replace Guus Hupperts with Zinedine Machach.
Feyenoord make their third substitution with Naoufal Bannis replacing Nicolai Jorgensen.
In the minute 84, Dick Advocaat is making the team's fourth substitution at Covebo Stadion - De Koel with Mark Diemers replacing Jens Toornstra.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-3.
